title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Betelnut Pejiu Wu
directions: between Webster St and Buchanan St
content: "Pejiu Wu" means side street beer house. Along with oversized mugs of Asian beer you will find Pan-Asian authentic regional dishes. The food here tends to be quite hot. With its authentic style cuisine, it has become a Cow Hollow establishment. Look out for the long lines though and the staff can sometimes be a bit unfriendly.
